bug.title: Problems with Exceptions when all Windows are closed
bug.body: I am currently working on #15. When the Plugin throws an error, between the user pressed connect and the display of the main-window, the Plugin throws that error but does not terminate its process. This may also occurs in other situations.

bug.title: Connection to STS Official Plugin Tester sometimes breaks during initialization
bug.body: Happens on current master (0fb0f28d672329ec843c6cde3b5dc45ea189918a) and other branches. Plugin exits with message "Closing socket" in `System.err`
